component.name: CHIRP-next
component.summary: CHIRP is a free, open-source tool for programming your radio.

description.p: CHIRP is a FREE cross-platform, cross-radio programming tool. It works on Windows MacOS, and Linux. It supports a growing list of radios across several manufacturers and allows transferring of memory contents between them.
This Flatpak is packaged by reesericci, not the maintainers of CHIRP
